course.title: PSY 2106 Quantitative Methods in Psychology I (3 units)
course.desc: Descriptive statistics: frequency distributions, measures of central tendency and variability, normal curve, correlation and regression. Introduction to inferential statistics: hypothesis testing, t-test and chi-square. Application to psychology. Leads to PSY 2116.Course Component: Laboratory, LecturePrerequisites: PSY 1101, PSY 1102. Reserved for students registered in the Major, Joint Honours and Honours programs in psychology.
